content: शठ् {vI.v} {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> (शठति) {@--1@} To deceive, cheat, defraud. {@--2@} To hurt, kill. {@--3@} To suffer pain. {vII.v} {c10c} <ab>P.</ab> (शठयति) {@--1@} To finish. {@--2@} To leave unfinished. {@--3@} To go, move. {@--4@} To be idle or lazy (शठयति). {@--5@} To deceive, cheat. {@--6@} To speak ill of. {@--7@} To speak well or elegantly.
